医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
麻省理工学院的工程师为细胞设计了锻炼垫，以研究运动的机械效应毫无疑问，锻炼对身体有好处，包括增强和调理我们的肌肉。但运动究竟是如何实现这一目标的呢？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/MIT-engineers-design-workout-mat-for-cells-to-study-exercises-mechanical-effects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/MIT-engineers-design-workout-mat-for-cells-to-study-exercises-mechanical-effects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=20e92e08-9716-4c02-8596-8ce8d13a8b96 Fri, 20 Oct 2023 18:20:00 -0400 MIT engineers design workout mat for cells to study exercise's mechanical effects
为什么为幼儿寻找新冠疫苗仍然如此困难？ 9 月 12 日，疾病控制与预防中心建议 6 个月及以上的所有人进行下一轮新冠疫苗注射。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Why-is-finding-covid-shots-for-young-children-still-so-hard.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Why-is-finding-covid-shots-for-young-children-still-so-hard.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=74f85203-33d6-4e18-b4d3-05c7ef6a8d7a Fri, 20 Oct 2023 14:30:00 -0400 Why is finding covid shots for young children still so hard?
研究人员开发基于人工智能的工具来估计癌症患者的生存机会根据 2023 年美国外科医生学会 (ACS) 临床大会上发表的一项研究，研究人员开发了一种基于人工智能 (AI) 的工具，用于估计新诊断的癌症患者长期生存的机会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Researchers-develop-AI-based-tool-for-estimating-cancer-患者-chances-for-survival.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Researchers-develop-AI-based-tool-for-estimating-cancer-患者-chances-for-survival.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=01858e63-076f-4a64-8d36-1eaff5a146ed Fri, 20 Oct 2023 13:45:00 -0400 Researchers develop AI-based tool for estimating cancer patient's chances for survival
研究显示，在儿科准备程度最高的创伤中心接受治疗的儿童死亡的可能性较小新的研究显示，最初在护理儿童准备程度最高（称为儿科准备水平）的创伤中心接受治疗的儿童，其死亡可能性明显低于在儿科准备程度较低的创伤设施中接受治疗的儿童。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Children-treatment-at-trauma-centers-with-highest-pediatric-readiness-less-likely-to-die-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Children-treatment-at-trauma-centers-with-highest-pediatric-readiness-less-likely-to-die-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=806605d5-fff1-4a08-83e9-891d9c175f04 Fri, 20 Oct 2023 13:38:00 -0400 Children treated at trauma centers with highest pediatric readiness less likely to die, study shows
科学家发现一组可能导致老年男性严重哮喘的免疫细胞拉霍亚免疫学研究所 (LJI) 和英国南安普顿大学的科学家发现了一组可能导致严重哮喘的免疫细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Scientists-uncover-a-group-of-immune-cells-that-may-drive-severe-asthma-in-older-men.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Scientists-uncover-a-group-of-immune-cells-that-may-drive-severe-asthma-in-older-men.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7b49ac7-26d8-4fde-9029-430b8cfd849f Fri, 20 Oct 2023 12:39:00 -0400 Scientists uncover a group of immune cells that may drive severe asthma in older men
加州大学洛杉矶分校健康中心参与一项新研究，收集有关双相情感障碍患者的大量数据据世界卫生组织称，一项新研究正在收集有关双相情感障碍患者的大量数据，以改善对这种影响全球 4000 万人的精神健康状况的诊断和治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/UCLA-Health-participates-in-new-study-gathering-extective-data-about-people-with-bipolar-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/UCLA-Health-participates-in-new-study-gathering-extective-data-about-people-with-bipolar-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e500fe7a-6eb6-4a66-a966-6347e304833d Fri, 20 Oct 2023 12:35:00 -0400 UCLA Health participates in new study gathering extensive data about people with bipolar disorder
科学家开发出罕见瘫痪疾病的基因治疗方法这 50 个家庭遍布荷兰、英国、美国和中国。每个家庭都有一个因名为接触素相关蛋白 1 (Cntnap1) 的单一基因突变而瘫痪的孩子。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Scientists-develop-gene-therapy-approach-for-rare-paralyzing-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Scientists-develop-gene-therapy-approach-for-rare-paralyzing-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dadfec80-6dc0-4274-895b-191b183e7992 Fri, 20 Oct 2023 11:59:00 -0400 Scientists develop gene therapy approach for rare paralyzing disease
新方法使用磁铁来排列肌肉细胞麻省理工学院 (MIT) 和波士顿大学的研究人员 10 月 20 日在《Device》杂志上报告称，用磁铁刺激肌肉纤维会使它们向同一方向生长，从而排列组织内的肌肉细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/New-method-uses-magnets-to-align-muscle-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/New-method-uses-magnets-to-align-muscle-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=15507422-461c-4b2f-9ded-3930087d997b Fri, 20 Oct 2023 11:52:00 -0400 New method uses magnets to align muscle cells
让我们诚实地讨论一下随着年龄的增长会发生什么我们中有多少人想要一本可靠的、基于证据的衰老指南，来解释随着年龄的增长，我们的身体和思想如何变化，以及如何适应这些差异？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Lete28099s-have-an-honest-conversation-about-what-to-expect-as-you-age.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Lete28099s-have-an-honest-conversation-about-what-to-expect-as-you-age.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c0671f33-cb01-42a6-ad09-449c9e72ce87 Fri, 20 Oct 2023 11:48:37 -0400 Let’s have an honest conversation about what to expect as you age
研究揭示结核菌如何形成索状来抵抗抗生素结核分枝杆菌 (MTB) 是一种严重的呼吸道感染，它能够形成蛇状索，早在近 80 年前就首次被注意到。在 10 月 20 日发表在《细胞》杂志上的一项研究中，研究人员报告了这些索形成的生物物理机制，并证明了几代分裂细菌如何结合在一起形成这些能够抵抗抗生素的结构。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Study-reveals-how-tuberculosis-bacteria-form-cords-to-resist-antibiotics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Study-reveals-how-tuberculosis-bacteria-form-cords-to-resist-antibiotics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=62504202-39c0-4c94-aa34-e6dcd14e715f Fri, 20 Oct 2023 11:45:00 -0400 Study reveals how tuberculosis bacteria form cords to resist antibiotics
